Name: Burning Brick Breaker
About the game: A classic brick breaker game brought back to life. No two levels are the same, and each level has a unique twist on it. Progress your way through all the levels trying to achieve a new high score, or play each level individually and work conquering objectives to gain stars (and new cosmetic items).
